Dataset Name: Geographical Original of Music Data Set
Brief description: Audio features of music samples from different locations.
Preprocessing: Audio features extracted using MARSYAS software.
Creator: F. Zhou et al.

Brief description: Audio features from one million different songs.
Creator: T. Bertin-Mahieux et al.
